text: (āyiṉum,) avarkaḷil evarkaḷ nampikkai koṇṭu, naṟceyalkaḷaic ceytu, (taṅkaḷ kavitaikaḷil) allāhvai atikamāka niṉaivu ceytu (piṟar mūlam) aniyāyattiṟku uḷḷāṉataṉ piṉṉar, paḻi vāṅkiṉārkaḷō avarkaḷait tavira (maṟṟavarkaḷ kuṟṟavāḷikaḷtāṉ. Piṟarai tuṉpuṟuttiya) aniyāyakkārarkaḷ tāṅkaḷ eṅku tirumpac cella vēṇṭumeṉpatai aticīkkirattil aṟintu koḷvārkaḷ
